title: Envelope
description: An envelope including relevant timestamps, sender id and data type for any kind of message

sampled_at.title: Sample timestamp
sampled_at.description: The unix timestamp in seconds at which `data` was sampled.

sent_at.title: Sent timestamp
sent_at.description: The unix timestamp in seconds at which `data` was sent.

data.title: Message data
data.description: The message contained by this envelope

sender_id.title: Sender ID
sender_id.description: The unique identifier of the sender instance

data_type.title: Message data type identifier
data_type.description: A unique identifier of the data type carried by this envelope
